verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אַל־ [T'al- תַּשְׁחֵת֮ <WH516> tash-Chet Altaschith לְדָוִ֪ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid of David מִ֫כְתָּ֥ם <WH4387> mich-Tam Michtam בִּשְׁלֹ֥חַ <WH7971> bish-Lo-ach sent שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul; when Saul וַֽיִּשְׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> vai-yish-me-Ru and they watched אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֝בַּ֗יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit, the house לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH4191> la-ha-mi-To. to kill him הַצִּילֵ֖נִי <WH5337> hatz-tzi-Le-ni Deliver מֵאֹיְבַ֥י׀ <WH341> me-'o-ye-Vai me from mine enemies אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai; O my God מִּמִתְקוֹמְמַ֥י <WH6965> mi-mit-kom-Mai me from them that rise up תְּשַׂגְּבֵֽנִי׃ <WH7682> te-sag-ge-Ve-ni. defend

הַ֭צִּילֵנִי <WH5337> Hatz-tzi-le-ni Deliver מִפֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> mip-Po-'a-lei me from the workers אָ֑וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven; of iniquity וּֽמֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> u-me-'an-Shei men דָ֝מִ֗ים <WH1818> da-Mim, me from bloody הוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3467> ho-shi-'E-ni. and save

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki For הִנֵּ֪ה <WH2009> hin-Neh behold אָֽרְב֡וּ <WH693> 'a-re-Vu For lo they lie in wait לְנַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> le-naf-Shi, for my soul יָג֣וּרוּ <WH1481> ya-Gu-ru are gathered עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai against עַזִ֑ים <WH5794> 'a-Zim; the mighty לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor פִשְׁעִ֖י <WH6588> fish-'I against me not [for] my transgression וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor חַטָּאתִ֣י <WH2403> chat-ta-Ti nor [for] my sin יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. O LORD

בְּֽלִי־ <WH1097> be-li- no עָ֭וֹן <WH5771> 'A-von themselves without [my] fault יְרוּצ֣וּן <WH7323> ye-ru-Tzun They run וְיִכּוֹנָ֑נוּ <WH3559> ve-yik-ko-Na-nu; and prepare ע֖וּרָה <WH5782> 'U-rah awake לִקְרָאתִ֣י <WH7125> lik-ra-Ti to help וּרְאֵה׃ <WH7200> u-re-'eh. me and behold

וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah O יְהוָֽה־ <WH3068> Yah-weh- Thou therefore O LORD אֱלֹהִ֥ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him God צְבָא֡וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <WH430> 'e-Lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הָקִ֗יצָה <WH6974> ha-Ki-tzah, awake לִפְקֹ֥ד <WH6485> lif-Kod to visit כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim; all the heathen אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תָּחֹ֨ן <WH2603> ta-Chon be not merciful כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- to any בֹּ֖גְדֵי <WH898> Bo-ge-dei transgressors אָ֣וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven to any wicked סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

יָשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> ya-Shu-vu They return לָ֭עֶרֶב <WH6153> La-'e-rev at evening יֶהֱמ֥וּ <WH1993> ye-he-Mu they make a noise כַכָּ֗לֶב <WH3611> chak-Ka-lev, like a dog וִיס֥וֹבְבוּ <WH5437> vi-Sov-vu and go round about עִֽיר׃ <WH5892> 'Ir. the city

הִנֵּ֤ה׀ <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold יַבִּ֘יע֤וּן <WH5042> yab-Bi-'Un Behold they belch out בְּפִיהֶ֗ם <WH6310> be-fi-Hem, with their mouth חֲ֭רָבוֹת <WH2719> Cha-ra-Vot swords בְּשִׂפְתוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8193> be-sif-to-tei-Hem; [are] in their lips כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- For מִ֥י <WH4310> mi Who שֹׁמֵֽעַ׃ <WH8085> sho-Me-a'. for who [say they] doth hear

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah O יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh But thou O LORD תִּשְׂחַק־ <WH7832> tis-chak- shalt laugh לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; תִּ֝לְעַ֗ג <WH3932> til-'Ag, in derision לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> go-Yim. at them thou shalt have all the heathen

עֻ֭זּוֹ <WH5797> uz-zo [Because of] his strength אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about אֶשְׁמֹ֑רָה <WH8104> 'esh-Mo-rah; will I wait כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, upon thee for God מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃ <WH4869> mis-gab-Bi. [is] my defence

אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei The God; חַסְדֹּו chas-dov כחַסְדִּ֣י <WH2617> chas-Di favour קיְקַדְּמֵ֑נִי <WH6923> ye-kad-de-Me-ni; shall prevent אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, me God יַרְאֵ֥נִי <WH7200> yar-'E-ni shall let me see בְשֹׁרְרָֽי׃ <WH8324> ve-sho-re-Rai. [my desire] upon mine enemies

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תַּהַרְגֵ֤ם׀ <WH2026> ta-har-Gem Slay פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> pen- or יִשְׁכְּח֬וּ <WH7911> yish-ke-Chu forget עַמִּ֗י <WH5971> 'am-Mi, them not lest my people הֲנִיעֵ֣מוֹ <WH5128> ha-ni-'E-mov scatter בְ֭חֵילְךָ <WH2428> Ve-chei-le-cha them by thy power וְהוֹרִידֵ֑מוֹ <WH3381> ve-ho-ri-De-mov; and bring them down מָֽגִנֵּ֣נוּ <WH4043> ma-gin-Ne-nu our shield אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai. O Lord

חַטַּאת־ <WH2403> chat-tat- [For] the sin פִּ֗ימוֹ <WH6310> pi-mo, of their mouth דְּֽבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- [and] the words שְׂפָ֫תֵ֥ימוֹ <WH8193> se-Fa-Tei-mov of their lips וְיִלָּכְד֥וּ <WH3920> ve-yil-la-che-Du let them even be taken בִגְאוֹנָ֑ם <WH1347> vig-'o-Nam; in their pride וּמֵאָלָ֖ה <WH423> u-me-'a-Lah and for cursing וּמִכַּ֣חַשׁ <WH3585> u-mik-Ka-chash and lying יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH5608> ye-sap-Pe-ru. [which] they speak

כַּלֵּ֥ה <WH3615> kal-Leh Consume בְחֵמָה֮ <WH2534> ve-che-Mah [them] in wrath כַּלֵּ֪ה <WH3615> kal-Leh consume וְֽאֵ֫ינֵ֥מוֹ <WH369> ve-'Ei-Ne-mov may be no וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ <WH3045> ve-ye-de-'U, [them] that they [may] not [be] and let them know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him that God מֹשֵׁ֣ל <WH4910> mo-Shel ruleth בְּיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> be-ya-'a-Ko; in Jacob לְאַפְסֵ֖י <WH657> le-'af-Sei unto the ends הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the earth סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

וְיָשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> ve-ya-Shu-vu let them return לָ֭עֶרֶב <WH6153> La-'e-rev And at evening יֶהֱמ֥וּ <WH1993> ye-he-Mu [and] let them make a noise כַכָּ֗לֶב <WH3611> chak-Ka-lev, like a dog וִיס֥וֹבְבוּ <WH5437> vi-Sov-vu and go round about עִֽיר׃ <WH5892> 'Ir. the city

הֵ֭מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like; יְנוּעוּן ye-nu-'un כיְנִיע֣וּן <WH5128> ye-ni-'Un continually קלֶאֱכֹ֑ל <WH398> le-'e-Chol; for meat אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo are not יִ֝שְׂבְּע֗וּ <WH7646> yis-be-'U, if they be not satisfied וַיָּלִֽינוּ׃ <WH3885> vai-ya-Li-nu. and grudge

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I אָשִׁ֣יר <WH7891> 'a-Shir But I will sing עֻזֶּךָ֮ <WH5797> 'uz-ze-Cha of thy power וַאֲרַנֵּ֥ן <WH7442> va-'a-ran-Nen yea I will sing aloud לַבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> lab-Bo-ker, in the morning חַ֫סְדֶּ֥ךָ <WH2617> chas-De-cha of thy mercy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הָיִ֣יתָ <WH1961> ha-Yi-ta have been מִשְׂגָּ֣ב <WH4869> mis-Gav for thou hast been my defence לִ֑י Li; וּ֝מָנ֗וֹס <WH4498> u-ma-Nos, and refuge בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day צַר־ <WH6862> tzar- of my trouble לִֽי׃ Li.

עֻ֭זִּי <WH5797> 'Uz-zi Unto thee O my strength אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about אֲזַמֵּ֑רָה <WH2167> 'a-zam-Me-rah; will I sing כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him for God מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י <WH4869> mis-gab-Bi, [is] my defence אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei [and] the God חַסְדִּֽי׃ <WH2617> chas-Di. of my mercy
